components.description:
An adult with no gender specified. This emoji may be used to talk about adults in a gender-inclusive way.

Variants include üë© Woman and üë® Man.
components.title: Person

components.description:
Zero Width Joiner (ZWJ) is a Unicode character that joins two or more other characters together in sequence to create a new emoji.

Zero Width Joiner, pronounced "zwidge", is not an emoji and has no appearance by itself. This is an invisible character when used alone.

View Emoji ZWJ Sequences that use this character.
components.title: Zero Width Joiner

components.description: An emoji component displaying a person's bald head. Intended for use within emoji sequences.
components.title: Emoji Component Bald

description:
A person with a bald head. Can be used to represent a bald person or a person with a shaved head. May also be used to represent a person experiencing hair loss from chemotherapy, alopecia, or other medical treatments or conditions. 

This emoji may be used to talk about bald people in a gender-inclusive way.

Variants include üë©‍ü¶≤ Bald Woman and üë®‍ü¶≤ Bald Man.
title: Person: Bald
apple_vendor_description: On Apple devices, the bald person emoji presents a friendly and approachable visage with smooth, rounded contours. Its skin tone, rendered with subtle gradients and realistic lighting, conveys a sense of warmth and individuality, a hallmark of Apple's design. This emoji on Apple devices is often used to represent oneself, a friend, or a family member with a distinct look, fostering personal connection in digital conversations.
